CustomField.formula: IF( AND( LOB__c=='Digital', ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'IVR-no email') ), 'a3s_rm', IF( AND( LOB__c=='Digital', TEXT(Source__c) <> 'IVR-no email' ), 'a3s', IF( AND( OR( LOB__c=='Retail - Secured', LOB__c=='Retail - Unsecured' ), ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'IVR-no email') ), 'finnone_rm', IF( AND( OR( LOB__c=='Retail - Secured', LOB__c=='Retail - Unsecured' ), TEXT(Source__c) <> 'IVR-no email' ), 'finnone', IF( AND( LOB__c=='Corporate', ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'RM-no email') ), 'corporate_rm', IF( AND( LOB__c=='Corporate', TEXT(Source__c) <> 'RM-no email' ), 'corporate', null ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: BRE Source
